function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Risk of transmission of contagious diseases in crowded urban green spaces","Impact":"Potential spread of COVID-19 and other contagious diseases among park visitors and staff","Mitigation":"Implement strict social distancing measures, enforce mask-wearing, and regularly disinfect public areas","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems for entry fees, online booking for workshops and banquets, and touchless hand sanitizer dispensers","People":"Park visitors, staff members, and nearby communities","Owner":"Park managers and not-for-profit organizations"},{"Description":"Risk of financial instability due to COVID-19 impact on visitor numbers and funding sources","Impact":"Decreased revenue from entry fees, services, and products, as well as reduced support from international donors","Mitigation":"Explore alternative revenue streams, apply for emergency relief funding, and collaborate with local businesses for sponsorship and support","Technologies":"Online fundraising platforms, virtual workshops and events, and digital marketing strategies","People":"Not-for-profit organizations, park managers, and local businesses","Owner":"Not-for-profit organizations and municipality"},{"Description":"Risk of community transmission and outbreak in nearby communities due to park-related activities","Impact":"Potential increase in cases of COVID-19 and other diseases among nearby residents and indigenous groups","Mitigation":"Engage in community outreach and education, provide free or subsidized testing and healthcare services, and encourage vaccination and adherence to public health guidelines","Technologies":"Telemedicine services, mobile healthcare clinics, and digital outreach campaigns","People":"Nearby communities, indigenous groups, and healthcare providers","Owner":"Not-for-profit organizations and municipality"}]}
